extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener

    InteractionPanel​(VideoBox videoBox)

      public void handlePositiveInteraction​(int timestamp)

      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp to create the interaction at

    • handleNegativeInteraction

      public void handleNegativeInteraction​(int timestamp)
      This method inserts a new negative Interaction in the database and tells the view to print it
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp to create the interaction at

    • handleQuestionInteraction

      public void handleQuestionInteraction​(int timestamp)
      This method handles the request of making a new question at the time equals to the timestamp. So it freezes the video and displays the question Text field
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp the question was required

    • dispatchFreezeEvent

      private void dispatchFreezeEvent()
      This method dispatches a new FreezeEvent

    • sendQuestion

      public void sendQuestion​(java.lang.String text)
      This method sends a New question, creating it to the database and dispatching it to the listeners to update other part of the ui
      Parameters:
      text - the body of the question to be created

    • deleteQuestion

      public void deleteQuestion​(Question question)
      This method deletes a question from the interactionList
      Parameters:
      question - the question instance to be deleted

    • handleDeleteRequest

      public void handleDeleteRequest​(boolean active)
      This method handles a delete request, toggling the deleteModel of the component
      Parameters:
      active - a parameter to know whether is possible to delete interactions or not, currently

    • dispatchDeleteQuestionEvent

      private void dispatchDeleteQuestionEvent​(DeleteQuestionEvent event)
      This method dispatches a new DeleteQuestionEvent
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be dispatched

    • listen

      public void listen​(Event event)
      Description copied from interface: Listener
      The listen method is overwritten from all classes that implement this interface. Each class will handle the Event that they receive and will act accordingly
      Specified by:
      listen in interface Listener
      Parameters:
      event - generic event received from a dispatch method of some other classes. This event can be extended in other subclasses in order to implement the polimorphysm.

      This method populates the Interaction List getting all the interactions of a video from the db
      Parameters:
      videoID - the video to take the interaction list of
